title: I just realized Riot's new refund/currency system is essentially communism
body:
People who can't afford anything (don't play very often) are getting more money at the expense of people who have played often and for a long time.

Lol.

http://68.media.tumblr.com/42490e19bc258e350eebe1dc189858a5/tumblr_oqfsgfVxe01rmerh9o1_1280.jpg
